cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Geoscience Australia Community Metadata Profile of ISO 19115-1:2014
Geoscience Australia Products Catalogue (eCat) – Short identifier for metadata record.

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Foundation Facility Point product contains five facility types, Private Hospitals, Public Hospitals, Aged Care Facilities, Educational Facilities and Emergency Management Facilities. The Foundation Facility Point Database presents the spatial location; in point format, of publicly available data. Facility Points are derived from various sources and consistency is mixed across Australia.

mrl:statement.gco:CharacterString:
Data supplied from the commonwealth, states and territories are passed through Feature Manipulation Engine (FME) workbenche(s) to standardise the datum to GDA2020 (EPSG:4844), perform base geometry validation and transform the attribute values to the national schema. No spatial modification has taken place with the source data, the attributes have been translated into the national specification. Educational buildings have ONLY been loaded for QLD, NSW, VIC and TAS due to licensing limitations with other states.
Source Information: The datasets are provided by the custodians of the individual national and state level datasets as follows:
Private and Public Hospitals Private and Public Hospitals are provided from the Australian Department of Health More information can be found at the Department of Health web page of https://department-ofhealth- covid-19-resources-australianhealth.hub.arcgis.com/ This material is released under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence. © Australian Department of Health 2020
Aged Care Facilities Aged Care Facilities are provided from the Australian Department of Health More information can be found at the Department of Health web page of https://department-ofhealth- covid-19-resources-australianhealth.hub.arcgis.com/ This material is released under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence. © Australian Department of Health 2020
Emergency Management Facilities: The primary information sources used to produce the Emergency Management Facilities feature type was acquired from each Emergency Management State and Territory agency. Access to the required spatial data and attributes for each facility was coordinated with the support of Emergency Management Spatial Information Network Australia (EMSINA). Metadata for Emergency Management Facilities can be found: https://17c190a2-a27b-4303-a186- 6e9cbeb1ad94.filesusr.com/ugd/e7ba1c_31462b7666bf4155b923a6009deaa6dd.pdf This material is released under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence.
Education Facilities Educational buildings have been provided from QLD, NSW, VIC and TAS. QLD - Department of Resources For Queensland, educational facilities are held in the Building Point dataset. Metadata for QLD building points can be found: http://qldspatial.information.qld.gov.au/catalogue/custom/search.page?q=Building+Points# Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International licence © State of Queensland (Department of Natural Resources, Mines and Energy) 2020
NSW - Spatial Services - Department of Finance, Services and Innovation For New South Wales, educational facilities are held in the Building Complex Point dataset. Metadata for NSW Building Complex Points can be found: https://sdi.nsw.gov.au/nswsdi/catalog/search/resource/details.page?uuid=%7B248ABBD3-6DB0- 4D6C-8BF1-DFDA561B28D8%7D Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 International licence. Additional terms for the use of DFSI Spatial Services material include that any derived products which are created will be required to clearly mark the date that any extractions from the DFSI Spatial Services Spatial Database occurred. All Intellectual Property (IP) which is owned by DFSI Spatial Services should only be loaded on any external cloud platforms if DFSI Spatial Services' Intellectual Property (IP) remains unchanged, maintained and preserved. © Department Finance, Services and Innovation 01 10 2020
VIC - Department of Environment, Land, Water & Planning For Victoria, educational facilities are held in the Feature of Interest dataset. Metadata for Feature of Interest can be found: http://services.land.vic.gov.au/catalogue/metadata?anzlicId=ANZVI0803003636&publicId=guest& extractionProviderId=1#tab0 Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International licence © State of Victoria (Department of Environment, Land, Water & Planning) 2020
TAS - Land Tasmania - Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment For Tasmania, educational facilities are held in the Building Point dataset. Metadata for Building Points can be found: https://www.thelist.tas.gov.au/app/content/data/geo-meta-datarecord? profileType=&groupName=&bboxNorth=&bboxWest=&bboxSouth=&bboxEast=&sc_tc_cod e=structure&sc_tc_code=transportation&sc_tc_code=utilitiesCommunication&query=building+poin ts&_keywordCategory=-1&isTasmania=true&custodian=&detailRecordUID=16cf2130-425b-4bce- 9593- 24e337317a71&searchCriteriaURL=query%3Dbuilding+points%26perPage%3D10%26sortBy%3DT itle%3AASC%26sc_tc_code%3Dstructure%26sc_tc_code%3Dtransportation%26sc_tc_code%3Dut ilities Communication Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia Licence © State of Tasmania (Land Tasmania - Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment) 2020
